title: HBO Max’s Julia Child Drama Finds a New Lead to Replace Joan Cusack
description: Joan Cusack was all set to play famous author and chef Julia Child in an upcoming HBO Max pilot, but since she left the project, the show needed a new cook in the kitchen. Now the fledgling streaming service has found a new star for the show. Get the details …
